attributes.name: Social Media Post
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Social Media Post card for content scheduling, publishing, and engagement tracking across multiple social platforms in the Boxel framework. This card should streamline social media management with unified posting, analytics, and team collaboration features.

## Core Fields

### Post Content
- **postText**: MarkdownField - Main post content with formatting
- **headline**: StringField - Optional headline for link posts
- **hashtags**: containsMany(StringField) - Hashtag collection
- **mentions**: containsMany(SocialMention) - @mentions and tags
- **postType**: StringField with enum: "text", "image", "video", "link", "carousel", "story", "reel", "poll"
- **callToAction**: StringField - CTA button text
- **ctaUrl**: URLField - CTA destination link

### Media Assets
- **primaryImage**: contains(ImageField) - Main visual content
- **images**: containsMany(SocialImage) - Multiple images for carousel
- **video**: contains(VideoField) - Video content
- **thumbnail**: contains(ImageField) - Video thumbnail override
- **altText**: StringField - Accessibility description
- **mediaCredits**: StringField - Attribution information

### Platform Configuration
- **platforms**: containsMany(PlatformConfig) - Platform-specific settings
- **primaryPlatform**: StringField - Main platform for optimization
- **crossPost**: BooleanField - Post to all selected platforms
- **platformVariations**: containsMany(PlatformVariation) - Platform-specific edits

### Scheduling & Publishing
- **status**: StringField with enum: "draft", "scheduled", "published", "failed", "archived"
- **scheduledDate**: DateTimeField - When to publish
- **publishedDate**: DateTimeField - Actual publish time
- **timezone**: StringField - Scheduling timezone
- **optimalTime**: BooleanField - Use AI-suggested timing
- **expiryDate**: DateTimeField - When to remove/archive

### Audience & Targeting
- **targetAudience**: contains(AudienceDefinition) - Intended audience
- **location**: contains(GeoTarget) - Geographic targeting
- **language**: StringField - Primary content language
- **ageRange**: contains(AgeRange) - Demographic targeting
- **interests**: containsMany(Interest) - Interest-based targeting

### Engagement Tracking
- **likes**: NumberField - Total likes/reactions
- **comments**: NumberField - Comment count
- **shares**: NumberField - Share/retweet count
- **clicks**: NumberField - Link click count
- **impressions**: NumberField - Total views
- **reach**: NumberField - Unique viewers
- **engagementRate**: NumberField - Engagement percentage (computed)
- **sentiment**: StringField - Positive, Neutral, Negative

### Team Collaboration
- **author**: linksTo(Contact) - Content creator
- **approver**: linksTo(Contact) - Who approved the post
- **campaign**: linksTo(Campaign) - Associated campaign
- **contentCalendar**: linksTo(ContentCalendar) - Calendar placement
- **comments**: containsMany(TeamComment) - Internal notes
- **version**: NumberField - Content version number

## Required Component Cards

### PlatformConfig Card
Create a separate PlatformConfig card with:
- **platform**: StringField - Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok
- **account**: linksTo(SocialAccount) - Platform account
- **postFormat**: StringField - Platform-specific format
- **characterLimit**: NumberField - Platform character limit
- **hashtagLimit**: NumberField - Maximum hashtags
- **mediaSpecs**: contains(MediaSpecification) - Size requirements
- **scheduledTime**: DateTimeField - Platform-specific timing
- **platformTags**: containsMany(StringField) - Platform features
- **boost**: contains(BoostConfig) - Paid promotion settings

### SocialImage Card
- **image**: contains(ImageField) - Image file
- **caption**: StringField - Image-specific caption
- **tags**: containsMany(ImageTag) - Tagged users/products
- **filter**: StringField - Applied filter/effect
- **cropSettings**: contains(CropData) - Platform crops

### EngagementMetric Card
- **timestamp**: DateTimeField - Metric capture time
- **platform**: StringField - Source platform
- **metricType**: StringField - Like, comment, share, etc.
- **value**: NumberField - Metric value
- **change**: NumberField - Change from previous
- **benchmark**: NumberField - Industry average

## Computed Fields Logic

### Engagement Rate Calculation
(Likes + Comments + Shares) / Impressions Ã— 100

### Optimal Posting Time
Analyze historical engagement data to suggest best posting times per platform and audience.

### Hashtag Performance
Track which hashtags drive the most engagement and suggest high-performing tags.

### Content Score
Algorithmic score based on engagement rate, reach, and conversion metrics.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a unified social media command center:

**Header Section**
- Post preview toggle (Desktop/Mobile)
- Platform selector tabs
- Status indicator with publish time
- Quick actions: Edit, Duplicate, Archive

**Content Editor**
- **Rich Text Editor**: 
  - Formatting toolbar
  - Emoji picker
  - Mention autocomplete
  - Hashtag suggestions
  - Character counter per platform
  
- **Media Manager**:
  - Drag-drop upload zone
  - Image editor integration
  - Video trimmer
  - Alt text fields
  - Platform-specific crops

**Platform Preview Panel**
- Live preview per platform
- Side-by-side platform comparison
- Mobile/desktop view toggle
- Story/feed format preview
- Character limit indicators

**Scheduling Interface**
- Calendar view with time slots
- Best time suggestions
- Timezone converter
- Bulk scheduling options
- Conflict detection

**Analytics Dashboard**
- Real-time engagement metrics
- Platform comparison charts
- Audience insights
- Best/worst performing elements
- Historical performance trends

### Fitted View Layout
- Thumbnail or first image
- Post excerpt (first 100 chars)
- Platform icons with status
- Key metrics (likes, comments, shares)
- Scheduled/published time
- Quick edit button

### Mobile Composer View
- Full-screen compose mode
- Platform switcher
- Media picker
- Quick scheduling
- Hashtag keyboard

## Interactive Features

### Smart Suggestions
- AI-powered caption writing
- Hashtag recommendations
- Optimal timing suggestions
- Emoji suggestions
- Trending topic alerts

### Content Variations
- A/B testing setup
- Platform-specific edits
- Language translations
- Regional variations
- Format adaptations

### Team Workflow
- Draft sharing
- Approval requests
- Comment threads
- Version comparison
- Change tracking

## Styling Requirements
- Clean, modern interface
- Platform-authentic previews
- High-contrast accessibility
- Mobile-first design
- Dark mode support
- Platform color coding
- Consistent iconography
- Print-friendly analytics

## Validation Rules
- Platform character limits enforced
- Image size requirements checked
- Video duration limits
- Hashtag count limits
- Required fields per platform
- Link validation
- Mention verification
- Schedule conflict prevention

## Integration Points
- **Social Platforms**: Native APIs for all major platforms
- **Media Libraries**: Unsplash, Getty, internal DAM
- **URL Shorteners**: Bitly, custom shorteners
- **Analytics Tools**: Platform Insights APIs
- **Design Tools**: Canva, Adobe Express
- **Team Tools**: Slack notifications
- **Calendar Systems**: Google Calendar, Outlook
- **CRM Integration**: Link to customer records
- **Influencer Platforms**: Creator marketplace
- **Compliance Tools**: Rights management

## Business Logic Requirements
- Multi-platform posting queue
- Automatic image resizing
- Link preview generation
- UTM parameter addition
- Sentiment analysis
- Spam detection
- Duplicate content warnings
- Platform limit enforcement
- Engagement prediction
- ROI calculation
- Competitor tracking
- Trending topic monitoring
- Crisis detection alerts
- Content moderation

## Platform-Specific Features

### Instagram
- Story templates
- Reel creation
- Shopping tags
- Location tags
- Music selection

### LinkedIn
- Article publishing
- Document sharing
- Poll creation
- Event promotion
- Company page posting

### Twitter/X
- Thread creation
- Quote tweets
- Twitter Spaces
- Community notes

### TikTok
- Sound selection
- Effect library
- Duet/Stitch options
- Trend participation
